Package org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class PhysiologySimulator

java.lang.Object
org.mitre.synthea.engine.PhysiologySimulator
public class PhysiologySimulator
extends java.lang.Object
Executes simulations of physiology models represented in SBML files.

      PhysiologySimulator constructor.
      Parameters:
      modelPath - Path to the SBML file to load relative to resources/physiology
      solverName - Name of the solver to use
      stepSize - Time step for the simulation
      simDuration - Amount of time to simulate

    • run

      public org.simulator.math.odes.MultiTable run​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> inputs) throws org.apache.commons.math.ode.DerivativeException
      Solves the model at each time step for the specified duration using the provided inputs as initial parameters. Provides the results as a map of value lists where each key is a model parameter. In addition to the model parameters is a "Time" field which provides a list of all simulated time points.

      Note that this method will throw a DerivativeException if the model encounters an error while attempting to solve the system.

      Parameters:
      inputs - Map of model parameter inputs. For any parameters which are not provided the default value from the model will be used. If null, all default parameter values will be used.
      Returns:
      map of parameter names to value lists
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.math.ode.DerivativeException - Exception if the solver encounters errors while computing the solution to differential equations

    • checkValidSolver

      public static boolean checkValidSolver​(java.lang.String solverName)
      Checks whether a string is a valid solver name.
      Parameters:
      solverName - solver name string to check
      Returns:
      true if valid false otherwise.
